trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Name
LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill four cards.

trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may return target Pirate creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It has base power and toughness 4/4. It gains haste until end of turn. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以将目标海盗生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且其上有一个终命指示物。它的基础力量与防御力为4/4。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（如果其上有终命指示物的生物将死去，则改为放逐之。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Name
LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, target attacking Vampire that isn't a Demon becomes a Demon in addition to its other types. It gains "When this creature dies, draw a card and create a tapped 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying."
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击且不是恶魔的吸血鬼成为恶魔，且仍具有原本类别。它获得「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌且派出一个已横置的4/3，黑白双色，具飞行异能的吸血鬼／恶魔衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Name
LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each Merfolk creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the exploring creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，令每个由你操控的人鱼勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在令之勘察的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you don't, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。若你未如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·4 | Pantlaza, Sun-Favored | Card Name
LCC·4 | Pantlaza, Sun-Favored | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may discover X, where X is that creature's toughness. Do this only once each turn. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个恐龙在你的操控下进战场时，你可以倾探X，X为该生物的防御力。每回合只能如此作一次。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Name
LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手牺牲一个永久物时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Carmen attacks, return up to one target permanent card with mana value less than or equal to Carmen's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当卡门攻击时，将至多一张目标法术力值等于或小于卡门力量的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Name
LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control but don't own gets +2/+2, has menace and deathtouch, and is a Pirate in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控但不由你拥有的生物各得+2/+2，具有威慑与死触异能，且额外具有海盗此生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell you don't own, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放不由你拥有的非生物咒语时，派出两个已横置的珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Name
LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if it targets two creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，{T}：目标由你操控的生物与另一个目标生物互斗。如果此异能以两个由你操控的生物为目标，则减少{2}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If a creature you control being dealt damage causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控之永久物的触发式异能因由你操控的生物受到伤害而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Name
LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，在目标地上放置一个洪水指示物。只要该地上有洪水指示物，它便额外具有海岛此地类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, untap each permanent you control with a counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控且其上有指示物的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Name
LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
trans-unit.target: 登殿（如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other artifact creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.
trans-unit.target: 只要你有黄金城祝福，由你操控的其他神器生物便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，派出一个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Name
LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a nontoken creature. If you do, draw X cards, then mill X cards, where X is that creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲一个非衍生物的生物。若你如此作，则抓X张牌，然后磨X张牌，X为该生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Craft with one or more creatures {2}{B}{B}
trans-unit.target: 以一个或更多生物化炼{2}{B}{B}

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Wretched Bonemass | Card Name
LCC·10 | Wretched Bonemass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the total power of the exiled cards used to craft it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于化炼它所放逐之牌的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Wretched Bonemass | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has flying as long as an exiled card used to craft it has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 只要某张化炼CARDNAME所放逐之牌具有飞行异能，它便具有飞行；且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Ore-Rich Stalactite | Card Name
LCC·11 | Ore-Rich Stalactite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Ore-Rich Stalactite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Craft with four or more red instant and/or sorcery cards {3}{R}{R} ({3}{R}{R}, Exile this artifact, Exile the four or more from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 以四张或更多红色瞬间和／或法术牌化炼{3}{R}{R}（{3}{R}{R}，放逐此神器，从你坟墓场放逐前述物件达四个以上：将此派在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Cosmium Catalyst | Card Name
LCC·11 | Cosmium Catalyst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, {T}: Choose an exiled card used to craft CARDNAME at random. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，{T}：随机选择一张化炼CARDNAME所放逐之牌。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·12 | Contest of Claws | Card Name
LCC·12 | Contest of Claws | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. If excess damage was dealt this way, discover X, where X is that excess damage. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。如果以此法造成过量伤害，则倾探X，X为该过量伤害之数值。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | Tetzin, Gnome Champion | Card Name
LCC·13 | Tetzin, Gnome Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Tetzin or another double-faced artifact enters the battlefield under your control, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among them into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当铁钦或另一个双面神器在你的操控下进战场时，磨三张牌。你可以将其中的一张神器牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | Tetzin, Gnome Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Craft with six artifacts {4} ({4}, Exile this artifact, Exile the six from among other permanents you control and/or cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 以六个神器化炼{4}（{4}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述物件达六个：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Card Name
LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, transform up to one other target double-faced artifact you control. Create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，转化至多另一个目标由你操控的双面神器。派出两个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·14 | Xavier Sal, Infested Captain | Card Name
LCC·14 | Xavier Sal, Infested Captain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Remove a counter from another permanent you control: Populate. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从另一个由你操控的永久物上移去一个指示物：殖民。只能于法术时机起动。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·14 | Xavier Sal, Infested Captain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Proliferate. Activate only as a sorcery. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物：增殖。只能于法术时机起动。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·15 | Eye of Ojer Taq | Card Name
LCC·15 | Eye of Ojer Taq | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: LCC·15 | Eye of Ojer Taq | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Craft with two that share a card type {6} ({6}, Exile this artifact, Exile the two from among other permanents you control and/or cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 以两个具共通牌张类别之物件化炼{6}（{6}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述物件达两个：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机精制。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·15 | Apex Observatory | Card Name
LCC·15 | Apex Observatory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped. As it enters, choose a card type shared among two exiled cards used to craft it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。于它进战场时，选择一种牌张类别，且须是化炼它所放逐之两张牌所具有之共通者。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·15 | Apex Observatory | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: The next spell you cast this turn of the chosen type can be cast without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {T}：对你本回合中施放的下一个该类别咒语而言，能以「不支付其法术力费用」的方式来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·16 | Paleontologist's Pick-Axe | Card Name
LCC·16 | Paleontologist's Pick-Axe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物攻击时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·16 | Paleontologist's Pick-Axe | Card Text | Paragraph 2
LCC·16 | Paleontologist's Pick-Axe | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Craft with one or more creatures {5} ({5}, Exile this artifact, Exile one or more creatures you control and/or creature cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 以一个或更多生物化炼{5}（{5}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的生物和／或你坟墓场中的生物牌中放逐前述物件达一个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·16 | Dinosaur Headdress | Card Name
LCC·16 | Dinosaur Headdress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将它贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·16 | Dinosaur Headdress | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME becomes attached to a creature, choose an exiled creature card used to craft CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME新贴附于某生物上时，选择一张化炼CARDNAME所放逐的生物牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·16 | Dinosaur Headdress | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature is a copy of the last chosen card.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物是最后所选之牌的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Name
REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
trans-unit.target: 化生{6}{U}（你可以牺牲一个生物并支付化生费用来施放此咒语，此时总费用会扣除该生物之法术力值。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·2 | Cresting Mosasaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, return each non-Dinosaur creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则将所有非恐龙生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Name
REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，在至多一个目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·3 | Spitting Dilophosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control with -1/-1 counters on them can't block.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控且其上有-1/-1指示物的生物不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Name
REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
REX·4 | Hunting Velociraptor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dinosaur spells you cast have prowl {2}{R}. (You may cast a spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a creature with any of its creature types.)
trans-unit.target: 你施放的恐龙咒语具有伺机{2}{R}。（如果你本回合中曾以与伺机咒语有共通生物类别的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害，则你可以支付该咒语的伺机费用来施放之。））

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Name
REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个力量等于或大于4且非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Name
REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个力量等于或大于4的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a Dinosaur creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains indestructible until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张恐龙生物牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。它获得不灭异能直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Name
REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I — For each opponent, up to one target noncreature artifact they control becomes a 0/4 Wall artifact creature with defender for as long as you control this Saga.
trans-unit.target: I — 为每位对手各选择至多一个目标由其操控且非生物的神器。于你操控此传纪的时段内，这些神器成为0/4具守军异能的墙神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: II — Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: II — 派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: III — Destroy all Walls. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: III — 消灭所有墙。放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Name
REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Text | Paragraph 1
REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each Dinosaur card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.)
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的每张恐龙牌均具有逸脱异能。其逸脱费用等同于该牌的法术力费用加上从你的坟墓场放逐三张其他牌。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放牌，并支付其逸脱费用。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} for each Dinosaur you control.

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Name
REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Owen into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与迅猛龙训练师欧文·格雷迪拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将欧文从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·8 | Blue, Loyal Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: For each kind of counter on CARDNAME, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的其他恐龙进战场时上面均有若干指示物，其种类与数量为「CARDNAME上的每种指示物各一个」。

trans-unit.resname: REX·9 | Compy Swarm | Card Name
REX·9 | Compy Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped token that's a copy of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则派出一个已横置的衍生物，此衍生物为CARDNAME的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: REX·10 | Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 古生物学家艾丽与艾伦

trans-unit.resname: REX·10 | Ellie and Alan, Paleontologists | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Discover X, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：倾探X，X为所放逐之牌的法术力值。只能于法术时机起动。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·11 | Grim Giganotosaurus | Card Name
REX·11 | Grim Giganotosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {10}{B}{G}: Monstrosity 10. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature with power 4 or greater your opponents control. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
trans-unit.target: {10}{B}{G}：蛮化10。对手每操控一个力量等于或大于4的生物，此异能便减少{1}来起动。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置十个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·11 | Grim Giganotosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes monstrous, destroy all artifacts and creatures other than CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME蛮化时，消灭CARDNAME以外的所有神器和生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 基因科技遗传学家吴亨利

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME and other Human creatures you control have exploit. (When a creature with exploit enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME和由你操控的其他人类生物具有榨取异能。（当具榨取异能的生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·12 | Henry Wu, InGen Geneticist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control exploits a non-Human creature, draw a card. If the exploited creature had power 3 or greater, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物榨取一个非人类生物时，抓一张牌。如果所榨取的生物力量等于或大于3，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Name
REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手抓每回合中其第二张牌时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During each player's turn, that player may cast a spell from among the cards they don't own exiled with CARDNAME, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 于每位牌手的回合中，该牌手可以从以CARDNAME放逐、且不由其拥有的牌之中施放一个咒语，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放之。

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Name
REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. It enters with a flying counter on it if a card discarded this way has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，弃任意数量的生物牌。如果某张以此法弃掉的牌具有飞行异能，则它进战场时上面有一个飞行指示物。且先攻、连击、死触、辟邪、敏捷、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Indominus Rex enters the battlefield, draw a card for each counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 当暴虐霸王龙进战场时，其上每有一个指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Name
REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst X (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 嗜血X（此生物进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为对手本回合受过的伤害数量。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text | Paragraph 2
REX·15 | Indoraptor, the Perfect Hybrid | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, choose an opponent at random. Indoraptor deals damage equal to its power to that player unless they sacrifice a nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，随机选择一位对手。除非该牌手牺牲一个非衍生物的生物，否则暴虐迅猛龙对该牌手造成等同于其力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: REX·16 | Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put your choice of a menace, trample, reach, or haste counter on target Dinosaur. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：在目标恐龙上依你的选择放置一个威慑，践踏，延势或敏捷指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: REX·17 | Permission Denied | Card Name
REX·17 | Permission Denied | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell. Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。所有对手本回合都不能施放非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Name
REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
trans-unit.target: 吞噬3（于它进战场时，你可以牺牲任意数量的生物。此生物进战场时上面有该数量三倍的+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它对至多另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.resname: REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Name
REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Dinosaur with flying enters the battlefield under your control, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains flying and haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, target land deals 3 damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个具飞行异能的恐龙在你操控下进战场时，获得目标由对手操控之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得飞行与敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，目标地对该生物造成3点伤害。
